title: An Act relative to a motorcycle safety fund

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2447) of Bruce E. Tarr for legislation to establish a motorcycle safety fund.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2

Hearing rescheduled to 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-11:45 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                               and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
